messages.subject: Can't login. Please help
messages.body_text:
Congrats Mock!

You can now respond to customers from Gorgias :thumbsup:

Let's get started by responding to this message. Can you tell us why you're trying Gorgias out? We respond to ALL our messages.

We look forward to hearing from you!

Romain & the Gorgias team
messages.body_html:
Congrats Mock!

You can now respond to customers from Gorgias 👍

Let's get started by responding to this message. Can you tell us why you're trying Gorgias out? We respond to ALL our messages.

We look forward to hearing from you!

Romain & the Gorgias team
